column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=I have one final question .
#Text=It 's on foreign policy .
#Text=How can the president deal with the nuclear situation in Iran ?
#Text=Well , the best thing to do is not to panic .
#Text=We have a lot of nuclear superiority .
#Text=Iran is at a stage right now where I think they 've only enriched up to the level of 20 .
#Text=There 's no proof that they have a nuclear weapon .
#Text=There 's no proof even according to our generals that they have a nuclear weapons program right now or the intent to build one .

#Text=You just listen to what people say , the generals and stuff , and even the Israeli generals , the ones that have retired from the Israeli intelligence , some of their retired military persons do n't think a strike would be good .
#Text=I do n't think it would be either .
#Text=I mean you 'd just radicalize a country of 70 million people .
#Text=We should have diplomatic relations with Iran .
#Text=We need to restore those .
#Text=We need to have an ambassador in Tehran .
#Text=They need to have an ambassador here .
#Text=We need to open a dialogue with Iran .
#Text=We did that with Russia .
#Text=We did it with China .

#Text=When Russia was a nuclear power , the Soviet Union , we had a hotline between [ U.S. President John ] Kennedy and [ Soviet Premier Nikita ] Khrushchev and then between every American president and Soviet premier after that .
#Text=No reason we should n't do it here with Iran .
#Text=They have 79 million people .
#Text=We need to have an ambassador in Tehran .
#Text=They need to have their ambassador in Washington .
#Text=We need to keep the lines of communication open .
#Text=Just talking does n't calibrate anyone 's philosophy but it does us give an opportunity to see what 's going on .
#Text=It opens things up a little bit and maybe we can learn more by having a channel than just turning the whole CV on them .
#Text=|
#Text=A lot of people are dying in Iran , and the more they know about America , the better it 's gon na be for us too .
#Text=There 's a lot of things about Iran I do n't like .
#Text=Some of the rantings and things about the Holocaust , that it did n't happen and that sort of thing , if that 's actually what he said , we do n't know if the translations are always right .
#Text=But anybody that would have a conference to deny that , you know , that 's not good .
#Text=I do n't like that .
#Text=But we have to deal with them as they are and not necessarily what they might be with some of these ridiculous historical interpretations they might make .
#Text=Despite all that , they 're still a power that has to be reckoned with .
#Text=They represent a lot of people .
#Text=Iran has 79 million people .
#Text=No reason we ca n't talk to them .
